article.title: General Dynamics Awarded $153 Million Navy Submarine Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: General Dynamics Advanced Information Systems has been awarded a $152.8 million contract by the U.S. Navy for fiscal years 2010 and 2011 production and deployed-systems support for the United States and United Kingdom SSBN fire control system (FCS) and the SSGN Attack Weapon Control System (AWCS).
